value.title: 3 Different Ways Power BI Projects Can FAIL! (and How to Avoid these Mistakes) 🔴Talk Power BI Dec 4
value.excerpt: Power BI Projects may not always be successful. But Failure can be a great teacher! Let's learn from three different stories of Power BI Project "Failure" and learn how you can avoid the same mistakes. ★CONNECT WITH OUR SPEAKERS★ ➔ Avi Singh: https://www.linkedin.com/in/powerbipro ➔ Ian Bowman: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mianbowman/

value.title: Can Power BI Transform Your Life at 40? (Or 20 or 60?) #PowerOn Show with Charles & Avi 🔴TalkPowerBI
value.excerpt: Both Charles and I, transformed our lives around 40 years of age. Power BI played a key role and leaving our jobs was a crucial step. But our transformation was a bit deeper than that. We want to share our journey with you, but also ask the important question...is there really a right age to transform

value.title: DAX Time Intelligence Functions for Beginners with Jeffrey Wang🔴Talk Power BI LIVE
value.excerpt: Datetime related calculations are some of the most common, yet confusing, calculations for people who are new to Power BI. value.title: How to Manage a Global Supply Chain with Power BI 🔴Talk Power BI LIVE (Subscribe & Join)

value.title: Is This a Good Time to Become a Power BI Consultant? Really? 🤔
value.excerpt: Is this really a good time to become a Power BI Consultant? Becoming an independent Power BI Consultant can be a path to make an impact, do what you love and create a life by your own rules. And surprisingly, some factors may make this the best time to take action. Watch the video to learn more  ➔ Links

value.title: Power BI DAX Measures: Understanding Filter Context using DATESYTD Example (I.C.A.N. Rule)

value.title: Power BI Drill Through: 5 Different Alternatives That May be Better For You!
